lentils license

This is a lentils plant that you found growing on land that you have had 100% claim to for the last 781 planetary orbits when you claimed the land.

preliminary scans indicate that it is nearly completely equal to lentils plants that had been growing there when you claimed the land.

on the a leaf of the plant, almost as if grown there naturally by the volition of the plant, is raised braille lettering that nearly blends in completely with the texture of the leaf.

the local usa vernacular interpretation might be something like: "everyone is welcome to send any amount of usa money to https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/gracesbio for any reason."

perhaps though, it's not entirely unlikely that the peculiarly designed leaf was the effect of another organism, company, or weather occurrence.

and funny enough, suddenly the dots on the leaf begin to take flight, appearing as if they were small organisms themselves the entire time.
